General.Name: China Jushi Co Ltd
General.Description: China Jushi Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of fiberglass and its finished articles in China and internationally. The company offers fiberglass and woven rovings for mat production and weaving; fiberglass for thermoplastics; high performance hybrid fiber; fiberglass products for continuous profiles, open molding, compression molding, pipes, fabrics and mats, and other processes; glass yarns; and electronic fabrics. Its products have applications in electronic and electrical, aerospace, transportation, building and construction, infrastructure, chemical anti-corrosion, energy saving and environmental protection, and sports and leisure sectors. The company was formerly known as China Fiberglass Co., Ltd. and changed its name to China Jushi Co., Ltd. in March 2015. China Jushi Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Tongxiang, China.
General.Address: No. 669, South Wenhua Road, Tongxiang, China, 314500
